pr_title: Add current block number to eth_getWork response

timeline.message:
Add current block number to eth_getWork response

Signed-off-by: Abdelhamid Bakhta <abdelhamid.bakhta@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to use Quantity here?
timeline.author: RatanRSur
timeline.diffHunk:

       final String[] result = {
         "0x" + BaseEncoding.base16().lowerCase().encode(rawResult.getPrePowHash()),
